casebody.data:
STATE
v.
SHROPSHIRE. 2017-1822 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 28, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion for leave to file delayed appeal. Motion granted. Appellant shall file a memorandum in support of jurisdiction within 30 days.

O'Connor, C.J., and French, J., dissent.
